mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (COUPON_NO, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_DISCOUNT, COUPON_DATE , COUPON_LIMIT, COUPON_STATUS) VALUES (COUPON_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{coupon_name}, #{coupon_discount}, SYSDATE, #{coupon_limit}, #{coupon_status})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUPON_NO, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_DISCOUNT, TO_CHAR(COUPON_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as coupon_date, COUPON_LIMIT, COUPON_STATUS FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(faq SYS_C008568) */ rownum as rnum, coupon_no, coupon_name, coupon_discount, coupon_date, coupon_limit, coupon_status FROM coupon WHERE <choose> <when test="search == 'all'"> </when>
<when test="search == 'coupon_name'"> coupon_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_discountASC'"> ORDER BY coupon_discount ASC </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_discountDESC'"> ORDER BY coupon_discount DESC </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_dateASC'"> ORDER BY coupon_date ASC </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_dateDESC'"> ORDER BY coupon_date DESC </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_limit ASC'"> ORDER BY coupon_limit ASC </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_limitDESC'"> ORDER BY coupon_limit DESC </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_statusASC'"> ORDER BY coupon_status ASC </when> <when test="search == 'coupon_statusDESC'"> ORDER BY coupon_status DESC </when> </choose> ) couponList WHERE rnum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
